charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1101_0100:
[Name:PlayerNickname ] heard an upbeat
rhythm coming from somewhere in town.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1101_0200: And when [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] headed towards the sound...
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_0400:
I was just watching Quaquaval dance to see if it
had any moves I could use in my own dancing!
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_0500: As you can see, Quaquaval is an excellent dancer.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_0600:
His legs are extremely powerful. With a single
kick, he can send a truck rolling!
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_0700:
He was not born with that strength, though...it
came from his everyday training.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_0900:
Even before he evolved—when he was still a
Quaxwell—he studied hard like you,
Master Tierno.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1000:
Every day, he observed people and Pokémon,
and worked on his dancing...
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1100:
and because of that continuous effort, Quaquaval
managed to perfect this dance.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1200:
It just shows how important it is to keep looking
at the wider world and learn new things!
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1300:
Ah, apologies. I’m aware my speeches tend to get
a little, shall we say, overlong.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1400:
You’re so knowledgeable about Pokémon,
Mr. Clavell! You’re like a Pokémon Professor!
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1500:
I actually used to do Pokémon research before
I became a director.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1600:
I have always been a fan of discovering new
things and learning about them...
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1700:
and my plan now is to teach everyone how fun
that can be.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1800:
Quaquaval and I have learned many things by
studying throughout this wide world.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_1900:
There are experiences and knowledge you can’t
find in textbooks and data...
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_2000: and all of that becomes your very own treasure.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_2100:
I hope both of you will find your own treasure
through studying.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_2200:
I guess my treasure would be dance! When it
comes to dancing, I won’t lose to anyone!
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_2400:
I thought that might be the case, seeing how
absorbed you get in dancing.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_2700:
It might just be my current job as academy
director.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_2800:
I find the utmost joy in teaching my students the
fun of studying and discovery.
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_2900:
You can take your time finding your very own
treasure, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="Master" F="Miss" ] [Name:PlayerNickname ].
charaepi_ch0318_00_claver/2301_1201_3000:
I am looking forward to seeing what kind of
treasure that will be.
